thread.title: Top celebrity travel pictures of the week
thread.title_full: Top celebrity travel pictures of the week

title: Top celebrity travel pictures of the week
text:
Top celebrity travel pictures of the week Last updated 12:25, October 15 2015 Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram Instagram 
Brazilian Victoria Secret model Adriana Lima enjoys a relaxing break, but still manages to look flawless. 
Katy Perry living life like a local in Peru, South America. 
Katy Perry enjoying her time at Uros Floating Islands, Lake Titicaca, Peru 
Kate Hudson looks like she needs some coffee before jetting off. 
The original beach babe, Britney Spears enjoys some sun and surf with her sons. 
Oh look, supermodel Alessandra Ambrosio is on holiday, again. 
Gwen Stefani having fun, with a wall, in New York City. 
Ahead of their crucial quarter-final clash against France, Sam and Conrad manage to fit in a dip in Swansea, Wales. 
Ruby Rose, upcoming host for the MTV European Music Awards (with Ed Sheran) enjoys the views from Table Mountain, South Africa. 
Our Lorde, drinking in the view during a well-earn break with friends. 
We really thought 'hot-dog' legs were over. Someone forgot to tell Heidi Klum. 
Paris Hilton looking like a Bond villain in Shanghai. 1 of 12 « Previous « Previous Next » Next » 
Celebrities always seem to be on holiday. Checkout some of their top travel pictures of the week.
